sources.title: Odd Triangle ( 1968)
sources.description: ADULTS ONLY!  PLOT:  Lesbian erotica ensues when Allison, a gorgeous woman disgruntled by her marriage, befriends a sexy suburban housewife named Janet, whose erotic stories ignite hidden passions. The two get it on and soon welcome the involvement of Winnie, a young guide with mature desires.

metadata.Plot: Lesbian erotica ensues when Allison, a gorgeous woman disgruntled by her marriage, befriends a sexy suburban housewife named Janet, whose erotic stories ignite hidden passions. The two get it on and soon welcome the involvement of Winnie, a young guide with mature desires.
metadata.Actors: Ulla Jensen, Betty Andrews, Suzan Thomas
